Room.Name: Delaney Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Delaney Drive, east of the Oceancrest Cobbler's shop.
Room.LongDescription: Good shoes are hard to find, but the Oceancrest Cobbler will provide you with a good pair of leather boots or walking shoes for a small price. He might even personalize them for you. On the east side of the road is the Cathedral of Worldly Bliss. The entrance to the cathedral is to the north.
